{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

# データを保存する","
","cur.execute('INSERT INTO person(name, age, gender) VALUES ("Sato", 15, "Man")')

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

# 任意の値を入れる
name = "Hashimoto"
age = 26
gender = "Woman"","

","# データを保存する","
","cur.execute('INSERT INTO person(name, age, gender) VALUES (?, ?, ?)', (name, age, gender))

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}
